levels.description: Attack Range expands, ATK <@ba.vup>+{acsupo_s_3.atk:0%}</>, Talent 1's effect increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale:0.0}</>x, all enemies within range receive a <@ba.vup>10%</> <$ba.fragile>Fragile</> effect and a <@ba.vup>10%</> <$ba.weaken>Enfeeble</> effect
